base_notes: All hours must be AMA PRA Category 1. No rollover of credits allowed. Professional boundaries course required for new licensees (1 hour within 12 months) and one-time requirement for existing licensees by December 31, 2025.
content_requirements_summary: OPIOID_PRESCRIBING (Controlled substance prescribing practices): 2.00 hrs - PER_YEAR - CONDITIONAL: Applies to all Alabama Controlled Substance Certificate holders | PROFESSIONAL_BOUNDARIES (Board-designated professional boundaries course): 1.00 hrs - ONE_TIME

base_notes: May not be exempted from more than 15 hours in 5-year period. Up to 25 hours may be carried forward to next licensing period.
content_requirements_summary: PAIN_MANAGEMENT (Pain management and opioid use and addiction): 2.00 hrs - PER_RENEWAL - CONDITIONAL: For each licensee who holds a DEA number
exemptions_summary: BOARD_CERTIFICATION - FULL EXEMPTION (AMA or AOA recognized boards)

accreditation_required: AOA Category 1-A minimum 24 hrs; AMA Category 1 max 16 hrs
base_notes: 24 hours must be AOA Category 1-A; no more than 16 hours AMA Category 1. No rollover.
board_name: Arizona Board of Osteopathic Examiners in Medicine and Surgery
content_requirements_summary: OPIOID_PRESCRIBING (Opioid prescribing (3 hours) OR pain management/addiction (3 hours)): 3.00 hrs - PER_RENEWAL

base_notes: Board does not allow rollover credits. All 40 hours must be board-approved CME.
content_requirements_summary: OPIOID_PRESCRIBING (Opioid prescribing (3 hours) OR pain management/addiction (3 hours)): 3.00 hrs - PER_RENEWAL

base_notes: At least 20 hours must be AOA Category 1A or 1B. Does not accept CME equivalents.
If initial license <13 months only 25 hours required. Pain management requirement is one-time only.
